      • setNumberOfRings

        public void setNumberOfRings(int n)
        Description copied from interface: IDistance
        Sets the number of rings. This number is multiplied by the Buffer distance. For instance, for a constant distance of 500 meters and two rings, the getBufferDistance will give a value of 1000
        Specified by:
        setNumberOfRings in interface IDistance
